text: Michael "Lufa" Kadosh (April 23, 1940 in Alexandria - April 29, 2014) was a former Israeli footballer. He worked as the manager of Hapoel Jerusalem. He won many awards during his 50 year career. Kadosh died on 29 April 2014 from cancer at the age of 74.הלך לעולמו מאמן הכדורגל מיכאל לופא קדוש ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Israel Category:Egyptian Jews Category:Israeli football managers Category:Israeli footballers Category:Jewish Israeli sportspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel
title: Michael Kadosh
